column1: Please describe the digitisation services provided by your library.

column3: We offer selective digitisation services to regional cultural heritage institutions (historical societies, museums, etc.) as well as services for members of the academic community.
Chapter scans for Blackboard.  Scans of archival materials for scholarly researchers and some others.

Some small project work for another public sector institution. We are currently reviewing if we want to repeat the activity but are currently leaning away from this activity as a result of human resource limitations
